Literally what hasn't been said about Half Life at this point. 

Go play it.

Get frustrated that there's platforming in a shooter.

Get depressed that we might never know how the series ends.

(P.S проходил с модом на субтитры (т.е отдельное приложение в steam(поэтому 11 минут.))) И еще одно, в этой игре нет целей! Иногда не понятно куда идти и что делать.
Два минуса:
СУБТИИРЫ
НЕТ ЦЕЛЕЙ
Aye, everyone gets to experience Half-Life now!

Revolutionary for its time, it’s easy to look less favorably on the original “Half-Life” today, because so much of what made this game special more than 20 years ago is taken for granted nowadays. And yet, even though many newer games easily manage to outdo “Half-Life” in spectacle, few of them have equaled its execution. Walking through and around Black Mesa today, a lot of the eerie atmosphere and tension players may have felt two plus decades ago, probably now get lost because of the low resolution textures and simple character models. The immersive level design is still top-notch though, as is the story’s gradual unfolding as you progress through the game. Definitely recommended for fans of classic games. Others, who are interested but don’t necessarily want to go back quite as far, may want to check out the “Source” version instead.

Awesome game
Especially the memories that brought me together several years ago
When I was Sick and had trouble moving and breathing strongly. I can't even get out of bed for a whole month
My computer was just next to me and I've been playing the game all the time since I wake up until I sleep
I still remember the snapshots and situations in the game and I will not forget them no matter how much I live
All thanks to the anitalink servers (at that time) and all the respect for the online players who were playing with me at that time
Thanks Half-Life

[h1]
Half-Life
[/h1]
[List]
[*]Жанр: экшн-шутер
[*] Вышла :9.11.1998г.
[*] Прошол: ~2000
[*]Движок :GoldSrc, Source,Source2
[*] Разработчик :Valve
[/list]
[h1]
Проснись и пой мистер Фримен, проснись и пой...
[/h1]
И так, перед нами легендарный Half-Life (Полу-распад). Игру я прошол в далёких нулевых, так что не смотрите на почасовку(можть позже перепройду,вспомню молодость). Сейчас же я просто хочу отдать дань данному проэкту и не просто проэкту, а шэдевру своего времени, да и просто шэдевру! Вспоминаю, как мы с братом играли в неё с упоением и любопытством, ведь у данного проэкта было всё: и технологичный движок с хорошей графикой, и прекрасный сюжет, и куча интересных локаций. Игровой процессс сильно затягивал, ведь на повестке дня были и перестрелка со спецназом, и зачистка местности от зомби и пришельцев, разминирование минного поля и т.д...Это вам не Quake,  хотя у него тоже особый шарм. Присутствует здесь игра по сети, и спустя 5 лет после прохождения я подключил второй комп через локалку, и мы рубились в халву на разных доступных картах, правда вдвоём(друг против друга), но было прикольно... 
[List]
[h1]
Итог :[/h1]
[*] Раритет
[*] Шедевр
[*] 100% ностальгия! 
[*] Оценка: 9 из 10
[/list]
[code]
Dez  22.01.2020 г. 11:48
[/code]

DIfficult at points but a fun experience overall

Immer noch ein echt gutes Spiel! Vorallem als Vorbereitung auf Half Life: Alyx sollte man es gespielt haben!
A great game for its time, but the combat did not age well.

"Do you know who ate all the Donuts?" Half Life is an absolutely incredible game which in many ways I believe surpasses that of its sequel. 

As Gordon Freeman, you have tremendous agency over your character as you blaze a path out of Black Mesa. You can be a benevolent Guardian to the victims of the disaster, or be a mass murderer who enjoys slaughtering everyone and everything in your path. Its entirely up to you.

The game is also a massive meme factory. The Scientists are hysterical.

Absolutely worth getting.
De mis juegos favoritos de todos los tiempos 9/10

Habe es mir erst jetzt geholt. Kannte es vorher nur vom hören.
Ganz klar eine Empfehlung! wer mal wieder  Spiele aus der guten alten Zeit spielen will kann sich das hier bedenkenlos holen. Mich erinnert das Spiel ein bisschen an Far Cry =)

A timeless classic, nuff said. The graphics, while surely they dated, still holds up decently for a game of it's age. But the most important part, the *feel* of it, is amazing.
The only thing wrong is there's no Freeman part 3.
还记得，小时候玩过盗版的半条命:起源，里面将整个游戏平均分成了十几个存档点（好像是16个吧），我当时还以为这游戏是一关一关来的。我进入每一个存档，都要卡关，这游戏是真的难。现在在Steam上买了半条命，玩了一下，还是那么难，可能玩不下去了。可是作为一个热爱FPS的玩家，对于这样一款伟大的FPS游戏，我要把它珍藏在我的Steam库中。
Honestly if you haven't played through the entire half life series what are you doing with your life

I love it. The story's amazing, The gameplay is great, and I'd even say it's one of , if not, the greatest FPS game of all time. Sure Half Life 2 is better but before you go and play that go and play the one that started it all for the Half-Life franchise. It's a real classic. It's one of the best games ever made and I guarantee you, you'll learn how to correctly use an Anti-Mass Spectrometer. In other words, shiny Xen crystals don't like Black Mesa equipment. In all honesty I'd rate it a 9.75/10.

Still holds up. Playing for the first time 20+ years after its release, I'm thrilled by the set pieces + combat and frightened by the tense ammo-starved moments + headcrab jump scares. "Blast Pit", "Residue Processing", and "Surface Tensions" are the stand-out levels. There are some outdated controls: several puzzles frustrated me until I learned I could crouch-jump to mantle (though this might not be due to age - a friend informed me that Thief: TDP shipped with auto-mantling in the same year) and the requirement to hold a button to /not/ sprint had my hand cramping after hours of play, especially during platforming sections that required moving along thin geometry. These inconveniences melt away, however, in the face of brilliant level design and scripting that stands up against modern shooter campaigns.
it's a good game that has a mostly good level design

Eu peguei Half-Life pela primeira vez recentemente, nunca havia tido contato com a franquia, apenas conhecia, a tal da franquia que revolucionou os jogos de tiro. Então, sobre o jogo, obviamente o grafico é bastante datado, por ser simplesmente um jogo do seculo passado, mas ainda continua um jogo muito, mas muito bom, é divertido, frenetico, cheio de ação, puzzles, com uma boa jogabilidade(talvez não tanto pros dias de hoje, mas ainda da pro gasto), e uma otima historia, amei o jogo, gostei mesmo, e algum dia com certeza irei joga-lo novamente.
to meio triste para escrever uma anilise. mas é bom. jogue
игра великолепна. Моя любимая игра и по сей день советую всем пройти всю историю Гордона Фримена

Fiquei anos sem jogar esse jogo desde do lançamento, como eu me arrependo! Um jogo com uma história que é contada bem devagar, simples, mas com muitas reviravoltas. Ambientação incrível, logicamente os gráficos e a jagabilidade está um pouco datada, mas com um pouco de treino, vc acostuma. Recomendo a todos que gastam de clássicos e de uma boa história Sci-fi.
Half-Life is an amazing game that has a great story to begin the Half- life franchise
It's a classic that holds up

Simplicity is key. Half-Life takes it's fundamentals of simplicity, easy to understand and straight forward scenarios and runs with it. This game is pretty damn good, to the guns, the puzzles, and the atmosphere of feeling hopeless is amazingly executed. I would most definitely recommend this game to anyone who's looking to play a good ass game. It holds up tremendously.

Overrated shite. Hit scan enemies + weak gun play = no fun. Maybe it was good 20 years ago.

Perhaps the best first person shooter ever created. The depth of the story told without any cut scenes is absolutely astonishing. Even for 2020, the AI for the HECU soldiers from 1998 is tough to fight against. Half-Life is one of my favorite games, and I've played it through many times.
